title: Ground News - ‘We do it to help out our other community members’: East Texas Fire departments assist locals in Panhandle
text: TYLER, Texas (KETK) - East Texas fire departments are showing their support and doing their part to stop the ongoing Panhandle wildfires. Texas courthouse arsonist sentenced to 75 years in prison “They have evacuated whole communities,” Eric Greaser, Smith County Emergency Services District 2 fire chief, said. “They have towns that have been burned over now.” Local fire chiefs told KETK that it is their duty to be on standby for potentia… 18 hours agoRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
